name: Dr. Bleeno's Dimension Glitcher
description:
You, Dr. Bleeno, have just finished your amazing Dimension Hopping Robot! On your first test voyage, however, something seems to have glitched out and now you're bouncing through dimensions left right and center! Can you make it to the end in one piece or will your first great adventure be your last?!

The controls are as follows: You can move left and right with the arrow keys, pan the camera up and down with up and down arrow, jump with spacebar, glide by holding spacebar down when you're in the purple color, and if you need to "R" restarts the level.
